metadata.title: PM meets Minister for Maritime Affairs, SAPM on Tribal Affairs

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 30 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday held separate meetings with Federal Minister for Maritime Affairs, Junaid Anwar Chaudhry, and Special Assistant to the Prime Minister (SAPM) on Tribal Affairs, Mubarak Zeb. During the meetings, discussions focused on key issues and developments related to their respective sectors. The Prime Minister reviewed progress and emphasized the importance of efficient service delivery and inclusive development.
